content.body: The HTML spec has explicit support for a character encoding menu, but only WebKit-based browsers still have it. I think we should just hand-wave it instead of working it into the algorithm. (If we work it into the algorigthm, I think we should write down the security characteristics of Gecko's implemenatation instead of writing down WebKit's approach.) Opinions?
In Gecko, as far as the algorithm is concerned, there is now a "force detector" flag.
